Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The subject property is a new construction 6 family building in the Greenwood Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn. It is being delivered completed with a Certificate of Occupancy. It is located on a quiet street less than 10 minute walk to the 25th street R train stop.

Four of the six apartments have private dedicated outdoor space and the building has a common roof deck. Every apartment has a washer / dryer and dishwasher.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 4 units: each have 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom. $1,200/month each
New plumbing, wiring, roof, heat pumps

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Take I-87 N and NY-7 E to 9th Street/W Sunnyside Way

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Offered for sale is a completely rehabbed ±3,000 SF, four unit multi-family apartment building in the City of Troy, NY

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Four Unit Multi-Family Apartment for SALE in Troy, NY!

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Building comprised of 47 two-bedroom units and three one-bedroom units
Includes a nearly new state of the art coin-operated laundromat

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the Village of Cobleskill, at the doorstep of SUNY Cobleskill

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Offered for sale is Green Bridge Apartments, a ±50 unit apartment complex in the Village of Cobleskill, NY

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 50 UNIT APARTMENT COMPLEX NEAR FOR SALE

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of Collegetown in Ithaca, NY, steps from the Cornell campus.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
**Please click "Visit Property Website" to the right to complete Confidentiality Agreement and instantly receive the comprehensive Offering Memorandum.**

A rare opportunity to own student housing just steps from prestigious Cornell University!
 
-Historically, 100% occupancy over the Seller's 34 years of ownership.
-4 neighboring buildings on 3 tax parcels ranging from 3-8 floors.
-Total of 50 units:
    -4 are ground level retail
    -46 are residential units that can accommodate up to 122 students

Price:MARKET
